items.sentence: Tom used to tell Mary stories about when he lived in Boston.
Tom was in a hurry so he left his breakfast only half eaten.
Tom was looking for place to eat that had reasonable prices.
Tom was with a girl, but I didn\'t manage to see who it was.
Most of us still aren\'t eating enough fruit and vegetables.
My French isn\'t perfect, but I can communicate well enough.
It\'s obvious Tom doesn\'t want to talk about what happened.
Tom wrote Mary a long letter, but he didn\'t send it to her.
Tom\'s parents instilled in him a glass-half-full mentality.
I had a hard time trying to persuade him to cancel the trip.
